amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 118-3 to require the CDC to produce a report to Congress on the number of visitors denied entry under this policy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 168 (Roll no. 111).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Boebert.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 168 (Roll no. 111).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
